subtitleNullable: The Indonesia Election News Dataset 2024 (Berita Pemilu 2024) in detik.com
descriptionNullable:
**Context**

The Indonesia Election News Dataset 2024 is a comprehensive collection of news articles and related textual content covering the national elections in Indonesia before the election year 2024. All of the data are collected from [detik.com](https://detik.com) using some keywords.

Prepared by Muhammad Arif Faizin

**Content**

Time Range: 
- Start Date: 2023-01-01 
- End Date: 2023-12-10

Number of Rows: 19,813

Columns:

- title: Title of the article
- author: The publisher portal or writer
- publish_date: Date of the article being published online in Indonesia human formatted time
- article_text: Text of the article in Indonesia
- url: The destinated URL that contains the article
- main_image: The featured image that provided in the article
